note:
Gen X cancer survivor. I see you through the cosmos.

Too weird for the nerds, too nerdy for the weirdos, and nowhere near cool enough to be punk. Bearing witness to the incipient doom of the anthropocene from deep in the belly of the capitalist food supply chain.

Nature lover, birder, cyclist. Buddhist/Dzogchen practitioner, but in an anarchistic kind of way. Very anti-racist, anti-sexist and anti-fascist. Patron of the arts, high and low.

If it bothers you when people talk about systemic problems, you're probably habitually numbing yourself to avoid seeing the ways that your life is built upon and contributes to those problems.

Seattle now, with roots in Colorado, Minnesota and Ohio -- but yeah I love this whole messed up world.

CW: radical politics, normie politics, occasional creative words, also some NBA, soccer
